name: Highway Rivals Kill Zombie
description:
Cars, Guns, and Zombies. What more could you want?
Start the Highway Rivals Kill Zombie and make your every bullet count!
Download Highway Rivals Kill Zombie and Play your new "FREE" game
Experience the extreme "action game" - Battle Path in 3D.

Key features:

- Crisp 3D graphics.
- Immersive CD Quality Audio.
- Highly Addicting, Highly polished gameplay.
- 3 Guns.
- 4 Cars.
- Brilliant vehicle and physics
- Endless Mode
- EASY CONTROLS (Tap to shoot)
- Improve your skills
